dict.string: Set to 1 whether the app can access calendar/reminders, 0 otherwise.
Set to 1 whether the app can record audio from the mic, 0 otherwise.
Set to 1 whether the app can access the camera/library, 0 otherwise.
Set to 1 whether the app can access the contacts list, 0 otherwise.
Set to 1 whether the app can get the device's location, 0 otherwise.
Set to 1 whether the app can access Twitter or Facebook data, 0 otherwise.
Set to 1 whether the app can make network connections, 0 otherwise.
